text: avar paṟaññu: ī kālikaḷuṭe garbhāśayaṅṅaḷiluḷḷat ñaṅṅaḷile āṇuṅṅaḷkk mātramuḷḷatuṁ, ñaṅṅaḷuṭe bhāryamārkk niṣid'dhamākkappeṭṭatumāṇ‌. at cattatāṇeṅkilēā avarellāṁ atil paṅk paṟṟunnavarāyirikkuṁ. avaruṭe ī jalpanattin takka pratiphalaṁ avan (allāhu) vaḻiye avarkk nalkunnatāṇ‌. tīrccayāyuṁ avan yuktimānuṁ sarvvajñanumākunnu
